item.title: The Need to Address the Application Lifecycle
item.description: Simply put, without Enterprise Cloud Management you can’t provide “everything as a service IT” to your business users and developers without the risk of governance, compliance and security issues that can be costly to your enterprise financially and damaging to its reputation.

item.title: Why Enterprise Cloud Management?
item.description: Enterprise Cloud Management enables self-service, on-demand deployment and management of applications and services across private, public and hybrid clouds.

item.title: Managing a Hybrid Cloud Ecosystem
item.description: Enterprise Cloud Management enables self-service, on-demand deployment and management of applications and services across private, public and hybrid clouds.

item.title: Accelerating DevOps Leveraging the Cloud
item.description: ServiceMesh’s DevOps solution automates and governs key aspects of the Dev-to-Ops lifecycle to increase the speed and frequency of software releases without sacrificing the quality and reliability of software in production.

item.title: Security and Governance in an Enterprise Hybrid Cloud
item.description: Enterprise Cloud Management enables self-service, on-demand deployment and management of applications and services across private, public and hybrid clouds.

item.title: Hybrid Cloud
item.description: Effective, centralized governance across a hybrid cloud environment is not only necessary, but accelerates enterprise cloud adoption and business benefit realization.

item.title: Agility Operations
item.description: Operations consolidates all cloud environments managed by the Agility Platform into a single runtime management console with fine-grain visibility into costs, resource consumption, workload performance and more.

item.title: Agility Release Manager
item.description: Release Manager increases the speed and frequency of software releases by promoting software builds and environments across the SDLC with governance, automation and control.

item.title: Agility Store
item.description: Store is a fully governed, self-service portal to access standardized and customizable applications, platforms, and other "as a service" offerings for on-demand deployment.

item.title: Agility Designer
item.description: A highly versatile, graphical workbench to assemble portable stacks, templates, and multi-tier application blueprints for deployment across hybrid clouds.

item.title: ServiceMesh Agility Platform™
item.description: A consolidated platform for cloud management, governance, and security across multiple heterogeneous public and private clouds.

item.title: 5 Cloud Security Myths Debunked
item.description: It’s time to separate fact from fiction and debunk some cloud security myths regarding Infrastructure as a Service — the building block for all other cloud services.

item.title: Golden State Foods Increases Agility and Controls Costs with Cloud
item.description: Golden State Foods, which supplies McDonald’s, Starbucks and other quick-service restaurants, uses cloud solutions by CSC to compete for new business with speed and flexibility.

item.title: Gaining Trust in Enterprise Cloud Security
item.description: Understand cloud security risks and mitigation strategies. Discover how to overcome the challenges of governing security systemically across the solution stack.

item.title: Horses for Sources Not Ranking the One-Trick Ponies
item.description: Horses for Sources article and blog post

item.title: CSC Cloud Migration Services
item.description: Accelerate your time to value by leveraging CSC's cloud migration reference architecture, our global Migration Center of Excellence and industrialized, standardized migration processes.

item.title: International Resources Company Saves with CSC Enterprise Cloud
item.description: International resources company reduces cost and business risk with CSC Enterprise Cloud and WAVE (Workloads, Applications and Value for the Enterprise)

item.title: Healthcare firm H.D. Smith succeeds with the WAVE
item.description: Healthcare firm H.D. Smith uses CSC's WAVE method to migrate specific workloads and applications to the cloud in stages.

item.title: Four Waves to the Cloud
item.description: At H. D. Smith, a pharmaceutical distributor, the cloud is not a choice, but an imperative. CIO David Guzman, discusses why cloud computing offers compelling economics and capabilities.

item.title: 5 Steps to Enterprise Cloud
item.description: Will the consumer cloud — the popular, low-cost service offered by Amazon and others — be to cloud what the iPhone was to mobile? Siki Giunta, vice president and general manager of cloud services at CSC, says no.

item.title: Why Enterprise Clouds Rule
item.description: Cloud computing has become a key part of an IT leader’s toolkit. Many organizations use cloud for various reasons. It’s critical to select the appropriate cloud model.

item.title: 3 Reasons to Believe in Hybrid Clouds
item.description: Cloud services come in different shapes and sizes. Lately, many organizations are turning to hybrid solutions and infrastructure models that can be tailored to specific needs.

item.title: Rising Above the Fast Food Nation
item.description: Commentary on a comparative cloud blog: which cloud companies correspond to which fast food chains...with a focus on offering, popularity and caliber!

item.title: EMC World & Interop: After the Events
item.description: Post-event coverage of the EMC World and Interop events in Las Vegas, NV.

item.title: Webinar: Converged Threats, Integrated Defenses CSC/Symantec
item.description: CSC and Symantec’s webcast event to understand today’s threat landscape and discuss the defenses needed to keep your organization well protected.

item.title: Webinar: SAP in the Cloud: Stories from the Field
item.description: An interactive SAP insights webinar describing the business benefits of modernizing SAP infrastructure using cloud technology and services. This webinar features Mark Thorp, Alliance Director of SAP, Andy Sitison, EMC Director Application Sales and Sunil Bhargava, former CSC Global Portfolio Executive of Cloud Services.

item.title: Webinar: Let the Workloads be Your Guide to the Cloud
item.description: This on-demand 40 minute webinar shares information on how to let your applications and workloads guide you in your choice of what cloud deployment model you should consider given your business requirements, risk tolerance and compliance requirements.

item.title: Webinar: Cloud Lessons Learned: Gain Control, Mitigate Risk and Be Agile
item.description: A CSC Webinar featuring guest panelist David Tapper, IDC VP, Outsourcing and Offshore Services Market Research and Eli Almog, CTO CSC Cloud discuss cloud lessons learned around maintaining control, mitigating risk and becoming more agile in the Cloud.

item.title: Healthcare Distributor H.D. Smith Rides the CSC WAVE
item.description: Success Story: David Guzman, CIO of healthcare distributor H.D. Smith, uses CSC's WAVE to gradually migrate critical workloads and applications to the cloud in order to strengthen the enterprise.

item.title: How 'Everything as a Service' Can Save CIOs Money
item.description: As cloud computing emerges as a viable enterprise strategy, CIOs have more options than ever to choose from. But how does XaaS reduce costs, and how does everything fit together?
